>
[Caravan Leader](/Feats.aspx?ID=2115) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 204 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Constitution 18; [Pick up the Pace](/Feats.aspx?ID=2140)

</column>

---

You know how to get the most effort out of your allies on the road. When [Hustling](/Actions.aspx?ID=515) in a group during exploration mode, your group can Hustle for as long as the member who could Hustle longest on their own, plus an additional 20 minutes beyond that.
name: Caravan Leader
